short_description: servworx is a dry cleaner services company based in city of johannesburg metropolitan municipality, south africa.
long_description: as a south african company, we understand our role in making south africa prosper for all those who live in it. we strive to use proudly south african products where we can and support our local communities as much as possible. servworx has evolved from a family-run business in pietermaritzburg, started in 1923, into the largest independent black-owned provider of rented workwear in south africa. we are now a 51% black-owned b-bbee level 2 business, owned by letsema holdings. 1/4 drying / view of feeding stations for the tunnel finisher. as specialist suppliers of workwear and ppe to the food, pharmaceutical and oil & gas industries in south africa, we put quality and reliability above all else. our partnership with leading european fabric producer, klopman, allows us to manufacture and rent specialised workwear clothing that is designed to client specifications. our core values are centred around providing outstanding service and building strong long-term relationships with our clients.
generated_description: servworx is a south african company specializing in the supply of workwear and personal protective equipment (ppe) to the food, pharmaceutical, and oil & gas industries. founded in 1923 by luke and simon volans, servworx has evolved into the largest independent black-owned provider of rented workwear in south africa. the company offers a comprehensive range of services including workwear rental, industrial laundry, and custom workwear sales. servworx is 51% black-owned and operates as a b-bbee level 2 business. the company is known for its high-quality, custom-made garments that meet stringent hygiene and safety standards, and it partners with leading european fabric producers like klopman.
generated_business_tags: globally certified high-quality fabric | custom-sized and branded workwear | managed garment service | health and safety clothing and devices | customized work clothing | workwear rental services | personal protective equipment
